parameters.name: X-API-TOKEN
parameters.description: The API token to be used for authentication

parameters.name: X-Requested-With
parameters.description: Used to send the XMLHttpRequest header

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Includes child relationships in the response, format is comma separated. Check each model for the list of associated includes

parameters.name: email_receipt
parameters.description: If true, the payment will be emailed to the client. If false, no email will be sent. This will override any other email settings for payments.
